Aug. 16, 1924 D Nelson Contest
Nelson Contest 10 Other Nelson Contest nelson-contest
None
William Tell [arr. Rimmer]
Nelson, Lancashire, England, UK March: 1. Holme, 2. Lowerhouse. Prizes - 1st £25 and cup, 2nd £12.10s., 3rd £7, 4th £5, 5th £3. 5 bands competed.
Dec. 16, 2013, 6:14 p.m. Oct. 30, 2018, 9:38 a.m.
1 Lowerhouse Mills Burnley J. Jennings
2 BMP (Europe) Goodshaw Band William Pollard
3 Barnoldswick Prize Band Joe Smith
4 Blackburn Coronation R. Robinson
4 Holme Silver (Disposables UK Group) Band F. Clough
